text: Carl's Date (also known as Dug Days: Carl's Date) is a 2023 American computer- animated short film. It follows Carl Fredricksen (Ed Asner), who reluctantly goes on his first date since his late wife Ellie's death, but he does not know how dating works. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:English- language movies Category:2023 movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:Movies about old age Category:Pixar short movies
title: Carl's Date
